snippet: Expansion of Division I men’s lacrosse at F.B.S. universities has been hindered by high overhead costs and Title IX compliance. Michigan leapt these hurdles with a grassroots approach.
abstract: Expansion of Division I men’s lacrosse at Football Bowl Subdivision universities has been hindered by high overhead costs and Title IX compliance, but Michigan leapt these hurdles with a grassroots approach.
lead_paragraph: Expansion of Division I men’s lacrosse at F.B.S. universities has been hindered by high overhead costs and Title IX compliance. Michigan leapt these hurdles with a grassroots approach.

headline.seo: Michigan Club Lacrosse Team’s Transition to the Big Time
headline.main: Michigan Club Team’s Transition to the Big Time
headline.print_headline: Lacrosse Makes Leap as Michigan Club Team Moves to the Big Time
